requirements.title: We’re building a real-time interview intelligence platform that scores candidate
requirements.description: We’re building a real-time interview intelligence platform that scores candidates against live Job Descriptions. You’ll own end-to-end delivery of features that ingest JD inputs, run streaming analysis, and surface actionable insights to our users.

requirements.title: Design, build, and maintain Electron/Node.js features that capture JD inputs, st
requirements.description: Design, build, and maintain Electron/Node.js features that capture JD inputs, stream telemetry, and write persistent reports.

requirements.title: Implement high-performance data pipelines that transform audio transcripts into
requirements.description: Implement high-performance data pipelines that transform audio transcripts into structured evidence in near-real time.

requirements.title: Integrate OpenAI Realtime/Responses/Embeddings APIs with strong attention to rel
requirements.description: Integrate OpenAI Realtime/Responses/Embeddings APIs with strong attention to reliability, rate limits, and security compliance.
